PublicOverview.title: Public overview
PublicOverview.subtitle: Live transparency dashboard
PublicOverview.note: Data shown here is delayed and sanitized.

PublicTransparency.title: Transparency Report
PublicTransparency.subtitle: How Quantsail operates and keeps funds safe.
PublicTransparency.pipelineDesc: Quantsail uses an {b}Ensemble Strategy{/b} approach. Multiple distinct strategies (Trend, Mean Reversion, Breakout) vote on every tick.
PublicTransparency.voteAgg: {b}Vote Aggregation:{/b} Trades are only taken if a minimum number of strategies agree.
PublicTransparency.confScore: {b}Confidence Scoring:{/b} Each vote carries a confidence weight.
PublicTransparency.riskGates: {b}Risk Gates:{/b} Before entry, every trade passes through strict profitability checks (Fees + Slippage + Spread).
PublicTransparency.safetyDesc: We prioritize capital preservation over profit.
PublicTransparency.circuitBreakers: {b}Circuit Breakers:{/b} Trading pauses automatically on high volatility, spread spikes, or consecutive losses.
PublicTransparency.newsEvents: {b}News Events:{/b} Negative high-impact news triggers an immediate entry pause.
PublicTransparency.dailyLock: {b}Daily Lock:{/b} We enforce a daily "Walk Away" target to secure profits and a hard stop to limit drawdowns.
PublicTransparency.privacyDesc: This public dashboard provides real-time transparency into our trading performance without compromising security or strategy alpha.
PublicTransparency.hidden1: Exact Exchange Order IDs (to prevent front-running or tracking)
PublicTransparency.hidden2: API Keys and Secrets (never leave the secure enclave)
PublicTransparency.hidden4: Exact Position Sizes (bucketed or normalized for privacy)

Dashboard.overviewSubtitle: Monitor real-time trading performance and system health.
Dashboard.liveWarn: You are about to enable real money trading. This process is irreversible.
Dashboard.step1: Step 1: Request arming token. This verifies your identity and intent.
Dashboard.tokenAcquired: Token acquired. Confirm to start live execution immediately.

ExchangePage.title: Exchange Management
ExchangePage.noKeys: No keys found. Add one to start trading.
ExchangePage.revokeConfirm: Are you sure you want to revoke this key? It cannot be undone.

StrategyPage.title: Strategy & Config
StrategyPage.immutableNote: Changes create a new immutable version. The engine will pick up the new active version on its next loop tick.
StrategyPage.editorDesc: Edit JSON directly to update strategies, risk, and execution settings.

RiskPage.title: Risk & Controls
RiskPage.emergencyDesc: Immediate actions to control bot behavior.

UsersPage.title: User Management
UsersPage.subtitle: Create and manage operator access.
UsersPage.createDescription: Invite a new team member and assign a role.
